verbose_text: Moreover, pharmacological inhibition of the TOR kinase causes a G1 arrest in yeast due to a blockade in translation initiation, and a G1 arrest in humans due to the inhibition of eIF4E-BP phosphorylation and thus defective protein translation.
evidence: TOR kinase causes a G1 arrest in yeast               due to a blockade in translation initiation              , and a G1 arrest in humans               due to the inhibition of eIF4E-BP phosphorylation and thus defective protein translation
